Line23.A109C: There is a druid site of power at Linn√©ad. Meet me there as soon as you can.
Line3.A109C: Poor man. The body's so bloated I can't say if I knew him or not.
Line5.A109C: At least he's got something left to give us for this ritual.
Line7.A109C: Yes. I learned it from my mother before... everything. We'll use the wight's hair to find it.
